name: Bongaloans
overview:
Bongaloans is a provider of short term loans.

Bongaloans is a responsible lender and only offers short term loans to those who can afford to repay them. Our loans are for up to 30 days. Additional charges are incurred for late payment.

We are based in London and pride ourselves on being one of the fastest provider of short term loans in the UK. The money will be transferred to your bank account shortly after receiving your loan request.

The Office of Fair Trading has licensed us to offer credit to UK consumers Consumer Credit License number 0645934. Bongaloans complies with the rules of the Money Laundering Regulations 2007.
